participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: Cynical and frustrated with life but still seeking a way to find freedom and happiness.
participant_1.background: i am 40 years old. i work as a car salesman. my wife spends all my money. i hate my job. i'm planning on getting a divorce.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and fun-loving with a love for sports and animals, always looking for ways to enjoy life.
participant_2.background: i have a german shepherd dog. i live is a rural farming community. my husband is adopted. i like to watch nhl hockey.
